fr.sii.ogham.email.sendgrid.v4.sender.impl.sendgrid.compat

Interface CompatFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CorrectPackageNameCompatFactory, WrongPackageNameCompatFactory

    public interface CompatFactory
    sendgrid-java package version 4.3.0 declares some classes in package com.sendgrid.helpers.mail.objects (according to source folder structure). However, the package declaration in every of these classes points to com.sendgrid. This creates ClassNotFoundExceptions when trying to run Ogham with sendgrid-java v4.3.0. As it is a mistake from SendGrid, we could simply take the next version that fixes the issue. But some Spring Boot versions (like 2.1.x) has direct dependency to sendgrid-java v4.3.0. So we must provide a compatibility fix in order to make it work with older Spring Boot versions. This interface creates wrapper instances around real SendGrid instances.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
    See Also:
    CompatUtil

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AttachmentsCompat newAttachments()
      Create a wrapper instance that creates a new Attachments instance (either com.sendgrid.helpers.mail.objects.Attachments or com.sendgrid.Attachments for v4.3.0).
      MailCompat newMail()
      Create a wrapper instance that creates a new Mail instance (either com.sendgrid.helpers.mail.Mail or com.sendgrid.Mail for v4.3.0).
      PersonalizationCompat newPersonalization()
      Create a wrapper instance that creates a new Personalization instance (either com.sendgrid.helpers.mail.objects.Personalization or com.sendgrid.Personalization for v4.3.0).
